DOC.brief_summary: The survey is conducted to investigate the safety and efficacy of long-term use of BI-Sifrol Tablets in Restless Legs Syndrome (RLS) patients with or without renal dysfunction in routine medical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Survey on Long-Term Use of BI-SifrolÂ® Tablets in Patients With Restless Legs Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patient with Restless Legs Syndrome Exclusion criteria:
